After using FF4 RC2 for some time I notice that there are some unaccessible tabs. This is usualy my 1st tab, but also already happen to the 2nd tab once. Sometimes they cannot be clicked at all, other times when I click them they spawn a new tab with the same URL and transfer focus to that new tab. The resolution is to restart Firefox.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
n/a as I upgraded from FF 3.6 and already transfered about 10 tabs from there. The 1st tab is my gmail account if that is relevant at all...
Actual Results:  
Tab no. 1 cannot be clicked or cannot receive focus

Expected Results:  
Tab will be switched to.
